# Issue 12218: Content of general polynomial not defined.

The content of a general polynomial (which is the ideal generated by its coefficients) is not defined.

Assignee: tbd

Keywords: sd35

Resolution: fixed

Author: Michiel Kosters

Reviewer: David Loeffler

Merged: sage-5.0.beta0

<a id='comment:5'></a>Looks good to me. It is absurd that Sage doesn't recognize that the ideal {{{(2, 3, 1)}} of the integers mod 4 is the whole ring, but that is nothing to do with this patch.
